name: Muper
tagline: Music player client for windows, for the MPD music playing server
body:
Forked from WpfMpdClient, this is a client for the [MPD](http://www.musicpd.org/) music playing server, developed using C# and WPF. - Browse the database - Browse saved playlists - View lyrics - Scrobble last.fm - Download album art from last.fm - Watch popups on track change by the tray icon - Use multimedia keys (play, pause, next track, previous track)
keyboard-centric bug tracker continuous integration server
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
